ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: I was 7th lvl when I was last hunting with her, just so all things are in perspective.  The critters I was hunting were ebony drakes, gnome skeletons, earth
ygData.messageBody:
I was 7th lvl when I was last hunting with her, just so all things are in
perspective. The critters I was hunting were ebony drakes, gnome
skeletons, earth elementals, and any mino that snuck up on me. It also
works well on Orcs, giant scarabs, low-land basilisks, goblins, etc...


-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe


At 12:41 AM 05/27/1999 +0200, you wrote:
>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
>What lv are criters wich you hunt red or yellow?
>
>
>At 12.48 26/05/99 -0500, you wrote:
>>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>>
>>At 11:36 AM 05/26/1999 +0200, you wrote:
>>>From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>>>
>>>I agree thet our spells need a lower resistance against reds, but i dont
>>>know how we work in combination with enchanter wich lower resistance to
>>>higer reds and us nuking after this? maybe this was idea of vereant crew,
>>>anyone have experience with combat of wizard 16 or more lv with similar lv
>>>enchanter wich cast debuffs to lower resistance on high reds to confirm
this?
>>
>>This works very well. I hunt occasionally with an enchanter friend. She
>>would cast the inital debuff to lower magic resistance, the critter
>>charges, the pet blocks, I root and we both blast. If we get into trouble,
>>the pet blocks, I root and we both Gate. Great system.
>>
>>-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
>>
